act.title: Listen carefully
act.intro: Listen to the sentences below and decide what is being said.

item.quest: Has the guest already booked or not?
item.op: Yes, and he wants a single room.
No, he wants a single room.
Yes, but he wants to change to a double room
He booked the room for three days.
He booked the room by phone.
He booked the room three days ago.

item.quest: How does the customer proof his identity?

item.op: on the top floor, on the left
on the top floor, on the right
on the first floor, on the left
